dcterms:creator: A. S. Mian
M. Bennamoun
R. Owens
dcterms:description: The UWA dataset is a 3D scanned dataset, which contains four complete object models and 50 3D scenes. All four objects are placed manually to cause occlusions and clutter. Each object in each scene is annotated with a ground truth pose, which indicates the transformation from the object model to its real location in the scene.
dcterms:title: UWA dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Hinterstoisser
C. Cagniart
S. Ilic
P. Sturm
N. Navab
P. Fua
V. Lepetit
dcterms:description: The LineMOD dataset contains 15 complete object models. Each object is placed in a cluttered scene to generate test data, which are captured from approximately 1200 different viewpoints around the scene using a RGB-D sensor. The dataset is primarily used for 6D pose estimation.
dcterms:title: LineMOD dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Doumanoglou
R. Kouskouridas
S. Malassiotis
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: The bin-picking dataset contains two complete object models and 177 RGB-D scenes. In each scene, multiple instances of one or two objects are placed in a small bin, which is very challenging due to the heavy occlusions. The RGB-D scenes are converted to point clouds.
dcterms:title: Bin-picking dataset
